recommendations.title: Treating Trauma
recommendations.summary: Treating Trauma: Relationship-Based Psychotherapy with Children, Adolescents, and Young Adults presents a theoretically based and empirically supported framework for work with traumatized children, youth, and young adults who have spent time in foster care.

recommendations.title: Fostering Art Reincarnated
recommendations.summary: Describes a successful program for current and former foster teens and young adults

recommendations.title: The Trauma Therapist Project
recommendations.summary: Toni talks about her early experiences of seeing foster kids and realizing very quickly how inadequate the care was for this population

recommendations.title: Latest News
recommendations.summary: Summary of latest news and events
